meanings.definition: The act or process of coming together to form one mass or whole.
meanings.sent1: The coalescences of the clouds created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The coalescences of different ideas led to a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent3: The coalescences of flavors in the dish made it a culinary masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The coalescences of colors in the painting produced a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The coalescences of voices in the choir filled the room with harmony.

meanings.definition: The state of being united or merged into one entity.
meanings.sent1: The coalescences of the team members resulted in a successful project.
meanings.sent2: The coalescences of the two companies formed a powerful alliance.
meanings.sent3: The coalescences of laughter and joy filled the room with positivity.
meanings.sent4: The coalescences of talents in the band created an unforgettable performance.
meanings.sent5: The coalescences of cultures in the city made it a vibrant melting pot.
